message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, a chain can be constructed from Shirley to Madison: Shirley -> Evelyn -> Theresa -> Peter -> Barbara -> Nicole -> Elijah -> Kevin -> Sophia -> Scott -> Donald -> Rachel -> Austin -> Douglas -> Alice -> Michelle -> Betty -> Hannah -> Daniel -> Margaret -> Judy -> Christina -> Bradley -> Ralph -> Jack -> Eugene -> Samantha -> George -> Terry -> Charlotte -> Carol -> Patricia -> Bryan -> Ryan -> Amanda -> Kenneth -> Arthur -> Andrea -> Alexander -> Jose -> Richard -> Doris -> Aaron -> Melissa -> Joyce -> Joan -> Marie -> Lawrence -> Brian -> Karen -> James -> Mason -> Anthony -> Brandon -> Dorothy -> Katherine -> Janet -> Mary -> Matthew -> Timothy -> Noah -> Jordan -> Harold -> Madison. This chain shows that Shirley is an ancestor of Madison, meaning Madison is Shirley's descendant.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
